arts.ttl: Inter Milan 2-1 Sassuolo – Chivu Happy Over Win “But We Can Do Better” – Adds ‘Great Match’ By Italy Youngster

arts.ttl: Inter Milan 2-1 Sassuolo – Brazilian Summer Signing Delighted: “I Worked Hard To Get These Minutes’
arts.sum: Inter Milan summer signing Luis Henrique came off the bench today to play 25 minutes in his side’s 2-1 win against Sassuolo. The Nerazzurri won the game thanks to a goal from Federico Dimarco and an own goal deflected in from a Carlos Augusto effort. arts.ttl: Inter Milan 2-1 Sassuolo – Italy Star Elated: “We Needed To Win & We Did It”
arts.sum: Inter Milan wing back Federico Dimarco got on the scoresheet tonight in his side’s 2-1 win against Sassuolo at San Siro. A delightful team play resulted in the Italian slotting the ball past Sassuolo goalkeeper Arijanet Muric. arts.ttl: Inter Milan 2-1 Sassuolo – Brazil Match-winner & MOTM Praises Team’s Desire: “We Showed Desire To Win”
arts.sum: Inter Milan defender Carlos Augusto was named as Man of the Match in the Nerazzurri’s 2-1 win over Sassuolo on Sunday evening.
